name: Snake VS Block Game | Snake Beats
name_original: Snake VS Block Game | Snake Beats
description:
In this unusual world of Snakes with Headphones, swipe your finger to guide the crazy Snakes and break through the colorful 3D Speaker blocks.

As you make way through these 3D Speaker blocks, pick balls to make the biggest snake ever. It’s easy! Let your finger slide, collect Snake balls and crash blocks by your snake. Show your talent and grab high scores by playing this amazing game of Snake Beats

Game Features of Snake Beats:

- Free to play
- Endless & Versus mode gameplay
- Simple swipe control
- 10+ absolutely beautiful and upbeat music
- Beat your own Top score & Challenge your friends
- Collect beautiful skins for your Snake
- Breathtaking 3D visual and effects

How to Play Snake Beats:

- Pick your favorite music & enter the gameplay.
- Touch, Hold and drag the snake to make it swipe across the 3D Speaker blocks.
- Always choose the 3D speaker with a number less than your own length of the snake.
- Pick Snake balls to make the Snake grow bigger and bigger.
- Grab Gems to unlock new music & skins.
- Don't forget to challenge friends with your high score.

Snake Game + Beats + Hit Music = Awesomeness

It is very easy to play but very hard to reach high scores in Snake Classic Mode!

Snake Beats is totally FREE! Play this mind-blowing Snake music Game now!
